rioko.searchers.breadth

Class DirectedSearchIterator<V extends Vertex>

  • java.lang.Object
    • rioko.searchers.SearchIterator<V>
      • rioko.searchers.BreadthSearchIterator<V>
        • rioko.searchers.breadth.DirectedSearchIterator<V>
  • Type Parameters:
    V - Class of the vertex of the graph.
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.util.Iterator<V>

    public class DirectedSearchIterator<V extends Vertex>
extends BreadthSearchIterator<V>
    Breadth Searcher for graphs where an edge is valid if and only if the current vertex is the source of the edge.
    Author:
    Antonio
